script:
FireBest DissablePreCollapseFacilityWhenNeeded 
SalvageGenFromSeed
ShowDefaultVisual
FireBest SalvageCheckHostile
text: Captain, we have arrived at our destination. According to these coordinates we are now at the main testing facility where Project Cheron was conducted. We will be descending into the research complex soon.
As your fleet moves in closer, sensors detect multiple contacts rising up from the depths of the planet. Their design does not match any of the designs registered in your Tripad database.
Now that defenders have been defeated, the path to facility is clear and ready to be explored.

options:
0:explore_theta:Send a salvage team down to the facility
100:defaultLeave:Leave
